task.name: impbcor
task.shortdescription: Construct a primary beam corrected image from an image and a primary beam pattern.
task.description:
Correct an image for primary beam attenuation using an image of the primary beam pattern. The primary beam pattern can be provided as an image, in which case 1. it must have the same shape as the input image and its coordinate system must be the same, or 2. it must be a 2-D image in which case its coordinate system must consist of a (2-D) direction coordinate which is the same as the direction coordinate in the input image and its direction plane must be the same shape as that of the input image. Alternatively, pbimage can be an array of pixel values in which case the same dimensionality and shape constraints apply.
One can choose between dividing the image by the primary beam pattern (mode="divide") or multiplying the image by the primary beam pattern (mode="multiply"). One can also choose to specify a cutoff limit for the primary beam pattern. For mode="divide", for all pixels below this cutoff in the primary beam pattern, the output image will be masked. In the case of mode="multiply", all pixels in the output will be masked corresponding to pixels with values greater than the cutoff in the primary beam pattern. A negative value for cutoff means that no cutoff will be applied, which is the default.

param.name: imagename
param.description: Name of the input (CASA, FITS, MIRIAD) image

param.name: pbimage
param.shortdescription: Name of the primary beam image which must exist or array of values for the pb response.
param.description: Name of the image (CASA, FITS, MIRIAD) of the primary beam pattern or an array of pixel values. Default: ''

param.name: outfile
param.shortdescription: Output image name. If empty, no image is written.
param.description: Name of output CASA image. Default: none. Must be specified.

param.name: overwrite
param.shortdescription: Overwrite the output if it exists?
param.description:
If output file is specified, controls if an already existing file by the same name can be overwritten. Default: True Options: True|False
If true, the user is not prompted, the file if it exists is automatically overwritten.

param.name: box
param.shortdescription: Rectangular region to select in direction plane. Default is to use the entire direction plane.
param.description: Rectangular region to select in direction plane. Default: '' (use the entire direction plane)

param.name: region
param.description: Region selection. Default: '' (use the full image)

param.name: chans
param.description: Channels to use. Default: '' (use all channels)

param.name: stokes
param.description: Stokes planes to use. Default: '' (use all Stokes planes)

param.name: mode
param.shortdescription: Divide or multiply the image by the primary beam image. Minimal match supported.
param.description:
Divide or multiply the image by the primary beam image. Default: 'divide'
Minimal match supported.

param.name: cutoff
param.shortdescription: PB cutoff. If mode is "d", all values less than this will be masked. If "m", all values greater will be masked. Less than 0, no cutoff.
param.description:
Primary beam cutoff. Default: -1.0 (no cutoff)
If mode is "d", all values less than this will be masked. If "m", all values greater will be masked. Less than 0, no cutoff (default)

param.name: stretch
param.shortdescription: Stretch the mask if necessary and possible?
param.description: Stretch the mask if necessary and possible? Default: False Options: False|True
